required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Randomized, Placebo- And Positive-Controlled Crossover Study To Determine The Effect Of Single-Dose CP-690,550 On QTc Interval In Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: ICH E14 recommends that a thorough QT/QTc (TQT) study should be performed to determine whether intensive monitoring of QT interval in target patient populations is required during later stages of development. The current study is designed to ascertain whether CP-690,550 is associated with QTc prolongation.

detailed_description.textblock: The current study is designed to ascertain whether CP-690,550 is associated with QTc prolongation

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Time-matched mean differences in QTcF intervals between CP-690,550 and placebo (baseline-adjusted) at each postdose time

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Time-Matched Difference in QTcF Intervals Between Moxifloxacin Compared to Placebo
secondary_outcome.time_frame: -1, -0.5, and 0 hrs predose and 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8, 12, 16 and 24 hr postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Time-Matched Difference in QTcB Intervals Between CP-690,550 Compared to Placebo
secondary_outcome.time_frame: -1, -0.5, and 0 hrs predose and 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8, 12, 16 and 24 hr postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Extrapolated Infinite Time [AUC(0-infinity)]
Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Extrapolated Infinite Time (AUClast)
Time to Reach Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax)
Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Extrapolated Infinite Time [AUC(0-infinity)] by CYP2C19 Genotype
Area Under the Curve From Time Zero to Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUClast) by CYP2C19 Genotype
Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) by CYP2C19 Genotype
Time to Reach Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax) by CYP2C19 Genotype
Plasma Decay Half-Life (t1/2) by CYP2C19 Genotype

intervention.description: Single dose 100 mg (5 x 20 mg tablets)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male and/or female subjects between ages of 18 and 55 years, inclusive.
- Body Mass Index (BMI) of approximately 18 to 30 kg/m2; and a total body weight >50 kg (110 lbs).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Use of tobacco- or nicotine-containing products in excess of equivalent of 5 cigarettes per day.
- 12-lead ECG demonstrating QTc >450 msec or other clinically significant abnormalities at Screening.
- History of risk factors for QT prolongation or torsades de pointes.
- Pregnant or nursing women; women of childbearing potential unwilling or unable to use an acceptable method of nonhormonal contraception from at least 14 days prior to first dose until completion of follow-up.
- Use of prescription or nonprescription drugs, vitamins and dietary supplements within 7 days or 5 half-lives (whichever is longer) prior to first dose of trial medication.
- Any clinically significant infections within past 3 months or evidence of infection in past 7 days.
